name: Spirit Shooter v1
description:
Spirit Shooter was made using Construct 3's Ghost Shooter tutorial.

Currently, the game is played using the arrow keys to move and the mouse to rotate. Left click to shoot . Once the game loads, you will need to click within the game window to get the arrow keys working.

There is no win state yet, because this is still in development.

I've made some modifications.

The red monster can move faster than the normal monster, but it takes less hits to kill.
There is a timer on the bottom of the game.  When it reaches 0, the game will end.
